channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-20221] Increase column width for partition_params
item.description: HIVE-12274 have addressed almost all metastore columns; however it have left out PARTITION_PARAMS; so in case of a partitioned tables the limits are still there.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
